## gk work pr merge

Merge existing PRs

### Synopsis


  The pr merge command will merge existing pull requests for each repository within the work item.


```
gk work pr merge [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  gk work pr merge
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for merge
```
